online_error.title: Please connect to the internet
online_error.body: Doki Doki Mod Manager requires an internet connection to download resources for the first time. Please check your internet connection, then restart.

modal_error.title_fatal: Oops, Doki Doki Mod Manager crashed
modal_error.description_general: Please try what you were doing again, and if you keep running into problems, please let me know!
modal_error.description_stacktrace: Here's the technical details of what went wrong - please keep a note of these if you ask for help.

drop_cover.text: Drop a mod here to install it

onboarding.title: Welcome!
onboarding.description_download: Let's find a copy of DDLC.
onboarding.description_why: Doki Doki Mod Manager requires a copy of DDLC as a .zip file. If you already have a copy of DDLC, you can choose it now, otherwise a new copy will be downloaded directly from itch.io. We can't directly distribute DDLC, so this is the next best thing.
onboarding.description_unexpected: If you aren't expecting this, you may have a corrupt version of the game downloaded. Try downloading it again.
onboarding.status_downloading: Downloading game files - {0} complete ({1} left, {2} MB/s)
onboarding.status_errored: The download failed, or was interrupted. Check your internet connection and try again.
onboarding.status_offline: You need an active internet connection to download DDLC.
onboarding.description_location: Your games will be stored at {0}

modal_issue_report.title: Report an issue
modal_issue_report.description: If your issue requires a direct reply, or doesn't fit any of the categories listed here, please send an email instead.
modal_issue_report.placeholder_mod: Please paste a link to the mod's website or download page.
modal_issue_report.placeholder_body: Please give as much detail as possible. If it is relevant, please provide instructions on how to reproduce the issue.

modal_uninstall.title: Are you sure you want to uninstall this?
modal_uninstall.body: Your save data for {0} will be deleted, and you will need a copy of the mod to install it again.
modal_uninstall.body_globalsave: Your save data for {0} will not be deleted. However, you will need a copy of the mod to install it again.

modal_archive.title: Are you sure you want to archive?
modal_archive.body: Archiving will delete the game data for {0} to save disk space. Your save data will not be deleted, but you'll need a copy of the mod to install it again.
modal_archive.body_warning: Any changes made to other data, such as character files, will be undone if you archive the game. Be careful!

modal_save_delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete your save data?
modal_save_delete.body: You will have to start {0} again from scratch.

modal_installing.title: Installation in progress
modal_installing.description: Please wait a minute or so while the game installs.

modal_unarchive.title: Launch game
modal_unarchive.description: Please select the mod that was originally installed, then click Launch. {0} will no longer be archived.

modal_unarchiving.title: Reinstalling game
modal_unarchiving.description: The game will start once it has finished reinstalling.

modal_running.title: Game running
modal_running.description: Close the game to make changes to your mods.

launch_lock_confirmation.message: The cloud save file is in use!
launch_lock_confirmation.details: If you launch now, you may lose your progress.

launch_noauth_confirmation.details: If you launch now, your save file will not sync to the cloud.

launch_offline_confirmation.details: If you launch now, your save file will not sync to the cloud.

mod_delete_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete the mod?
mod_delete_confirmation.details: You will need to download another copy of the mod to install it again.

install.description_achievements: Keep playing to unlock more achievements.
install.description_screenshots: Press S while playing to take a screenshot.
install.description_sdk: This mod supports special features with the Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK!
install.description_mas_export: Monika is ready to be taken out with you.

install_creation.title: Install DDLC
install_creation.status_exists: The folder name is already in use.
install_creation.warning_no_space: Sorry, you don't have enough free space to install DDLC - you need at least 2 GiB of free space. Close Doki Doki Mod Manager, clear up some space and try again. Alternatively, you can install onto a different drive in Options > Storage Location.
install_creation.placeholder_install_name: The name of the mod you're playing, or anything else you want.
install_creation.description_mod: Click to browse for a mod.
install_creation.warning_global_save: Using Global Save may cause issues with other copies of the game, as it will save your progress in the regular save data folder. Only use it if you have a specific reason to.

section_backgrounds.title: Background
section_backgrounds.subtitle: Customise your copy of Doki Doki Mod Manager with one of these backgrounds.
section_backgrounds.checkbox_modbg: Allow mods to display custom backgrounds (from screenshots or from mod authors)
section_backgrounds.description_credit: Original DDLC backgrounds courtesy of Team Salvato.
section_backgrounds.description_custom: If you move or delete the custom background image, your background will be reset.

section_storage.title: Storage Location
section_storage.subtitle: Change where your game data is stored.
section_storage.description_moving: Warning! If you choose to change your install location, all your mods, installations and save data will be moved. This may take several minutes, and cannot be interrupted.

section_updates.title: Updates
section_updates.subtitle: Get the latest version of Doki Doki Mod Manager.
section_updates.description_has_update: A new version of Doki Doki Mod Manager is available!
section_updates.description_no_update: You are on the latest version of Doki Doki Mod Manager.
section_updates.description_downloading: Downloading the update - feel free to continue using the application while you wait.
section_updates.description_downloaded: The update has been downloaded and will be installed when you quit.
section_updates.description_error: Unable to check for updates right now, please try again later.

section_language.title: Language
section_language.subtitle: Choose your preferred language. Translations may not be 100% accurate or complete.
section_language.link_contribute: Can you help translate Doki Doki Mod Manager? Click to join the community translation project.

section_sdk.title: Achievements & SDK
section_sdk.subtitle: Change the way achievements are handled.
section_sdk.checkbox_specified: When the mod specifies it supports them

section_discord.title: Discord Rich Presence
section_discord.subtitle: Share which mod you're playing with your Discord friends.
section_discord.description: Changes will take effect after restarting Doki Doki Mod Manager.

section_testing.title: Debug Options
section_testing.subtitle: Enable debug options for developers.
section_testing.description_mod_debug: Show a debug window with console output from your mod. Useful for testing the DDMM SDK.
section_testing.description_renpy: Set special debugging options for Ren'Py.

tab_about.title: About
tab_about.description: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a community-developed project that helps you find, install and play mods for Doki Doki Literature Club, a free Visual Novel game by Team Salvato.
tab_about.disclaimer_1: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a fan work of Doki Doki Literature Club and is not affiliated with Team Salvato. It is a fan work, as defined by Team Salvato's IP Guidelines.
tab_about.disclaimer_2: Doki Doki Mod Manager does not take responsibility for any damage caused to your files or computer, as a result of playing a mod or otherwise. It is up to you to ensure mods are safe to play.
tab_about.title_v4_beta: Doki Doki Mod Manager 4 beta testers
tab_about.link_weblate: Help translate Doki Doki Mod Manager into your native language - visit the project homepage

store.description: Mods listed here are not moderated or endorsed by Doki Doki Mod Manager. Proceed with caution!
store.error_loading: Can't load the mods right now.

jumplist.task_launch: Open Doki Doki Mod Manager and launch {0}.

running_cover.description_running: Close the game to make changes to your mods.
running_cover.install_missing: The install could not be found.
running_cover.install_corrupt: The install is incomplete or corrupt.
running_cover.install_crashed: The game failed to launch or crashed.

game_browse_dialog.title: Locate a copy of DDLC's zip file

shortcut_dialog.title: Choose where to place your shortcut

import_mas.title: Find where you copied Monika's character file

export_mas.title: Choose where you want to copy Monika to

redownload_confirmation.detail: There is already a copy of {0} in your mod library. Would you like to download it again? (This will overwrite the old copy)

dev_ui_load_fail.title: Failed to load from development server
dev_ui_load_fail.body: Loading from live UI servers instead.

renderer_freeze.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager stopped responding
renderer_freeze.body: If this issue lasts for a long time, close the app and start again.
